title: Secret Stash - Refillable Potion item
body:
Secret Stash does not appear to affect the Refillable potion. Consumable pots last 16.5 up from 15. The Refillable seems to remain at 12 sec.

Besides the 10% increased duration on elixir, is there anything that might be making pro players pick up this despite starting with Refillable?
